attributes.action: Stop Trump entering the UK for justifying torture and inciting hate crime
attributes.additional_details:
Trumps recent appointment to president and constant rant against muslims, mexicans and many others have already lead to numerous hate crimes, which he has not distanced himself from but has generally sought to excuse. His very public suggestions to beat up non-supporters was just the start. 

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/donald-trump-racist-examples_us_56d47177e4b03260bf777e83

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-38149406
attributes.background: Voted in during a power vacuum, the silent majority wanted change and blamed foreigners for all that had gone wrong with society. Standing up against fascists is done before they open the camps!! Never say; 'Ich habe es nicht gewusst'. Incitement to race and religious hatred is a crime!
